thread.name: Unable to open proposed change: 'is_draft' is not defined??

messages.content:
Hello,
Yes, this seems to have solved the issue! Thank you, and sorry to trouble you with what now seems like a trivial issue. üôÇ

Hey

Is this an instance that you upgrade from Infrahub 1.3?
If so, did you run the `infrahub upgrade` command as described in the Migration of an Infrahub instance sexction in the release notes? https://docs.infrahub.app/release-notes/infrahub/release-1_4_0#migration-of-an-infrahub-instance

Hello,
I am new to both Infrahub and Kubernetes so please bear with me. üòÖ 

I have run into an issue whenever i try to Create a proposed change. The new branch was created in Infrahub and not synced to github. 
The change I made was simply to update the "description" of a device object. 
This is the schema currently used for the device:
---
version: "1.0"
nodes:
  - name: Device
    namespace: Network
    display_labels:
      - name__value
    inherit_from:
      - CoreArtifactTarget
    attributes:
      - name: name
        kind: Text
        label: Name
        optional: false
        unique: true
      - name: description
        kind: Text
        label: Description
        optional: true

Any clues or ideas?
